mapper.insert: insert into MOVIE (MOV_NO, MOV_TITLE, MOV_SYNOPSIS, MOV_OFFICIALSITE, MOV_SCREENINGGRADE, MOV_POSTER, MOV_INTHEATERS, MOV_RUNTIME, MOV_TRAILER, MOV_GRADE, MOV_COUNT,MOV_GENRE, DIR_NO, ACT_NO, PRO_NO) values(movie_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{sysnopsis}, #{officialSite}, #{screeningGrade}, #{posterName}, #{intheaters}, #{runtime}, #{trailer}, #{movGrade}, #{movCount} ,#{genre}, #{dirNo}, 33, #{proNo})
